title: Luxury smoked mackerel pâté
ingredients: ['3 hot-smoked mackerel fillets', '55g cream cheese', '60ml soured cream', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '1 pinch paprika', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'lemon wedges, for garnish', 'chopped watercress, for garnish']
